item.title: The LG Lotus is Square to Be Hip
item.description:
The LG Lotus LX600, a new and innovative phone in the mobile market, boasts a unique square design. Don’t let its shape fool you; this phone is powerful and designed for messaging. The LG Lotus LX600 is slim, lightweight, and square. It flips open to reveal a full, backlit QWERTY keyboard. Despite this feature, it remains compact, even compared to typical messaging smartphones. The LG Lotus has a lot to offer...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-lg-lotus-is-square-to-be-hip/
